58.1.hd_quote: The very stimulation of the world is the basis of an aesthetic appreciation of its beauty and wonder.
58.1.behavioral_axis: Radiates joy first, then spends it on fixing patterns.
58.1.shadow_axis: If no outlet (no 18), joy turns to frustration.

58.2.hd_quote: I will provide energy for any kind of process.
58.2.behavioral_axis: Projects ‘my energy is available,’ so weird/edge projects appear.
58.2.shadow_axis: Gets judged by moralistic collectives for where energy goes.

58.3.hd_quote: The individual whose electric vitality creates its own stimulation and is not dependent on others.
58.3.behavioral_axis: Wants to run its own experiments and lead the stimulation.
58.3.shadow_axis: Refuses others’ experiments, then has to depend on them anyway.

58.4.hd_quote: A natural specialization that when confronted with a multiplicity of stimulations will have no inner difficulty in focusing on the appropriate influence.
58.4.behavioral_axis: Narrows the joy-field to what’s actually worth energizing.
58.4.shadow_axis: Too narrow → can ignore valid corrections.

58.5.hd_quote: The natural and practical instinct to protect oneself, regardless of temptations.
58.5.behavioral_axis: Everyone thinks they can tap this joy; it defends its fuel.
58.5.shadow_axis: Drops defenses and explores questionable stimulations.

58.6.hd_quote: The tendency to practicality that while thoroughly enjoying external stimulation, has the instinct to draw back when its independent integrity is threatened.
58.6.behavioral_axis: Will give everything to the right experiment; otherwise holds energy back.
58.6.shadow_axis: Over-identifies with stimulation and loses self.
